title: Did Rush Limbaugh Accuse Michael J. Fox of Exaggerating His Parkinson’s Symptoms?
subtitle: A 2006 controversy resurfaced in 2020 after the conservative radio host was diagnosed with lung cancer.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Radio host Rush Limbaugh once claimed that actor Michael J. Fox was "exaggerating" his Parkinson's disease symptoms in a political ad.
